Sentencas: As a typical waste, used cigarette filters (UCFs) are difficult to biodegrade and harmful to the environment.
Titulo: Application of biochar derived from used cigarette filters in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell (DC-SOFC) is an energy conversion device that can utilize carbon directly, including biochar, as fuel.
Titulo: Application of biochar derived from used cigarette filters in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: We report a superior DCSOFC powered by Fe-loaded UCF biochar in this paper.
Titulo: Application of biochar derived from used cigarette filters in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The microstructure and composition are characterized, indicating that the UCF biochar is micron-sized and contains metal elements such as K and Ca that are beneficial to the performance of DC-SOFC.
Titulo: Application of biochar derived from used cigarette filters in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The peak power density of the cell fueled by pure UCF biochar is 308 mW cm-2 and increases to 341 mW cm-2 after loading Fe as the catalyst, which is comparable to that of the cell with Fe-loaded activated carbon (368 mW cm-2).
Titulo: Application of biochar derived from used cigarette filters in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It proves the feasibility of the UCF biochar as fuel for DC-SOFCs, providing a theoretical basis and technical demonstration for the disposal and transformation of solid waste.
Titulo: Application of biochar derived from used cigarette filters in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell
